alert.note: Alert for Howard; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 12:32AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north-central Iowa and southeast Minnesota through 100 AM CDT... At 1231 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chatfield to near Lime Springs. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Chatfield around 1235 AM CDT. St. Charles around 1245 AM CDT. Lewiston and Harmony around 1250 AM CDT. Stockton and Canton around 1255 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Forestville State Park, Choice, County Roads 6 And 33, York, Wyattville, Isinours, Hutton, Fillmore, Utica and Peterson. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 230 and 249. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for northeastern Iowa...and southeastern Minnesota.
